definition: broom
to sweep
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
broom
to scan
to clean/to sweep
to sweep away/to sweep across
to tidy up/to mop up/a sweep (against crime)
to sweep a grave (and pay one's respects to the dead person)
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to sweep/to clean with a brush/to sweep away (often fig.)
to root out/to wipe out
to sweep the floor/to reach rock bottom/to be at an all-time low
to eradicate pornography and illegal publications
minesweeper (computer game)
broom
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
campaign against pornography

sentences.english: The vision sweeps to take intention in the store.
Sweep away all dharmas, and separate from all marks.
Perhaps this is what call "A house is not, how can sweep the world".
sentences.chinese: 這就是所說的“一屋不掃，何以掃天下”吧。

sentences.english: Perhaps this is what call "A house is not, how can sweep the world".
sentences.chinese: 這就是所說的“一屋不掃，何以掃天下”吧。

sentences.english: Then I rake my arm across the drainboard and send the dishes to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 然後我用胳膊把滴水板上的盤子通通掃到地板上。

sentences.english: I had stamped two seals and scanned them for you.
sentences.chinese: 我蓋了兩個印文併爲您們掃瞄之。

sentences.english: May you bring love, and may you bring happiness;
sentences.chinese: 你將滿載愛和懽樂而掃。

sentences.english: A dustpan is often used to pickup rubbish.
I can't sweep without a broom.
Disco Purge Method can be obtained via your DuPont Sales Representative.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯科吹掃方法可透過您的杜邦公司的銷售代表。

sentences.english: The leaves fall early this autumn, in wind.
sentences.chinese: 苔深不能掃，落葉秋風早。

sentences.english: I do hate to spoil your fun, but I've got something urgent to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 我真不願掃了你的興，但我有緊急的事必須告訴你。

sentences.english: But as soon as they don't, they'll cast you out like a leper.
sentences.chinese: 一旦他們不想要了，他們會像趕麻風病人一樣掃你走。

sentences.english: Lifted an eye to sweep 2 people's one eye in June, again pendency, can be not strange?
sentences.chinese: 六月擡眼掃了兩人一眼，又垂下，可不奇麼？

sentences.english: Low power scanning electron microscope image of tooth surface, computer-coloured yellow on blue background.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒表面的電子顯微鏡掃描圖。

sentences.english: He wanted to see if he could catch sight of the rival submarine.
sentences.chinese: 他想看看能否掃到敵方潛水艇一眼。
